Name: Malcolm Dawson
Job Title: Chief Executive and Chief Land Registrar
Job/Team Function: The chief executive of Land Registry, reporting to the Lord Chancellor. Responsible for the strategic direction and management of the Agency's operations, and answerable to Parliament for the proper financial management of Land Registry.

Name: John Wright
Job/Team Function: Accountable and responsible for all aspects of the Information Systems (IS) Directorate. Responsible for providing information systems to Land Registry's staff and customers, and for providing leadership to the IS community. This includes the direction of Land Registry�s IS policies, practices and resources including its personnel, external contracts, enterprise architecture, information assets and overall responsibility for information security. Senior Responsible Owner of Land Registry's e-services programme and Service Delivery programme.

Responsible for the leadership of the HR and corporate facilities and estates functions, ensuring efficient and effective day-to-day services that have the capacity and capability to support business change. Senior Responsible Owner responsible for the delivery of Land Registry's Accelerated Transformation Programme.

Name: Alasdair Lewis
Job/Team Function: Principal legal adviser responsible for the provision of legal services within Land Registry, including the management and development of the Agency's team of lawyers, and responsible for the legal framework for land registration and for the integrity of the register.

Name: John Peaden
Job/Team Function: Responsible for the delivery of operational Key Performance Indicators and for key decisions regarding operational strategy, performance and for work practices and procedures in 17 local offices and the central operations group.

Name: Heather Foster
Job/Team Function: Responsible for strategic financial, procurement and project planning. Financial management and business planning. Accountable and responsible for all aspects of the Finance Directorate which includes; Business Planning, Finance, Corporate Procurement, Project and Programme Centre, Risk Management and Internal Audit.

Name: Katie Gordon-Smith
Job/Team Function: Responsible for leading the Commercial and Customer Directorate in the development and implementation of customer experience and contact strategies, marketing, sales, product and service development, customer services, stakeholder engagement and International unit.

Responsible for the provision of legal advice to Land Registry on non-registration matters including compliance with central guidance and public rights legislation on competition issues, intellectual property rights, data protection, freedom of information and human rights.
